channel.title: New Rule! [Updated Sept.]
channel.description:
Ok, I've noticed a lot of site advertisement, rather than 'Rate some work that [b]I, myself,[/b] have done.
This is unacceptable: Uploading a template, changing a little bit of text, mild defacing of a pre-made template.
This is acceptable: Creating a website from scratch, creating or innovating website components and code.
I mean, think about it? You really think most of us are stupid enough to watch you pass on your shit? I know an advertisement from a 'Please rate a site I didn't make.'
Thanks.
[hr] We are not a SMF support site. I do not want anymore threads about SMF here. If you need help, go to their [url=http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php]forums[/url], or check out their [url=http://docs.simplemachines.org/]documentation[/url].

item.title: New Rule! [Updated Sept.]
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Ok, I’ve noticed a lot of site advertisement, rather than 'Rate some work that I, myself, have done.

This is unacceptable:
Uploading a template, changing a little bit of text, mild defacing of a pre-made template.

This is acceptable:
Creating a website from scratch, creating or innovating website components and code.

I mean, think about it? You really think most of us are stupid enough to watch you pass on your shit? I know an advertisement from a ‘Please rate a site I didn’t make.’

Thanks.

[hr]
We are not a SMF support site. I do not want anymore threads about SMF here. If you need help, go to their forums, or check out their documentation.

Read full topic
